name: Greased Bolt
description:
Congratulations on your successful acquisition of the experimental L135 rifle! It is extraordinarily powerful, capable of downing anyone with one hit!

Now for the unfortunate news: You still have three rooms full of security to pass before you are free. They know what you're up to - show no weakness or they'll swarm you down!

Outsmart and outgun melee and ranged goons with Only One in the chamber!

--
